page.title: 05OUR PET ANIMALS
page.content: My pet is a budgie.She is called Snowy.I feed her on bird seed and grit.Snowy is a white albino budgie with pink eyes and pink feet.Snowy is about nine or ten months old.The average age of a budgie is about five years old.Budgies are kept in cages.(Sally Anne's pet.) I have a golden labrador called Jasper.Dogs are commen pets,so are cats and budgies.I have a cat called Sheeba and three horses.Their names are Bess,Shacara and Sherry.I have three Highland cows and a baby Highland bull.Highland cows are unusual pets.I have quite a few doves as well.(Judith's pets.) My pets are an old English sheepdog called Elsa,a horse called Bess who has just had a foal,some chickens and a cockerel.They are all usual pets.(Helen's pets.)
